originContent: # Polyrhythm Mania
translatedContent: # Polyrhythm Mania

originContent: A game that faithfully recreates the *Polyrhythm* minigame from Rhythm Tengoku (リズム天国), with a
translatedContent: A game that faithfully recreates the *Polyrhythm* minigame from Rhythm Tengoku (リズム天国), with a

originContent: built-in level editor and side modes.
translatedContent: built-in level editor and side modes.

originContent: ## Features
translatedContent: ## Features

originContent: * Full re-creation of the Polyrhythm minigame from Rhythm Tengoku, *and more!*
translatedContent: * Full re-creation of the Polyrhythm minigame from Rhythm Tengoku, *and more!*

originContent: * A full *Story Mode* with over 40 levels
translatedContent: * A full *Story Mode* with over 40 levels

originContent: * Sort and organize your custom levels using the Library feature
translatedContent: * Sort and organize your custom levels using the Library feature

originContent: * Create custom levels with a built-in and intuitive level editor
translatedContent: * Create custom levels with a built-in and intuitive level editor

originContent: * Level effects such as changing the colour palette, adding text boxes, putting Skill Stars, and more
translatedContent: * Level effects such as changing the colour palette, adding text boxes, putting Skill Stars, and more

originContent: * Switch between classic GBA, modern HD, and arcade textures, or add your own custom texture pack
translatedContent: * Switch between classic GBA, modern HD, and arcade textures, or add your own custom texture pack

originContent: * Practice modes to improve your Polyrhythm skills with levels from the original GBA game
translatedContent: * Practice modes to improve your Polyrhythm skills with levels from the original GBA game

originContent: * Endless Mode keeps you on your toes with never-ending procedurally generated patterns
translatedContent: * Endless Mode keeps you on your toes with never-ending procedurally generated patterns

originContent: * Daily Challenge mode which has a series of patterns not seen in regular Endless Mode, with online leaderboards
translatedContent: * Daily Challenge mode which has a series of patterns not seen in regular Endless Mode, with online leaderboards

originContent: * Extra side modes like _Polyrhythm: Dunk_, _Polyrhythm: Assemble_, and _Built to Scale: Solitaire_ add more Polyrhythm fun
translatedContent: * Extra side modes like _Polyrhythm: Dunk_, _Polyrhythm: Assemble_, and _Built to Scale: Solitaire_ add more Polyrhythm fun

originContent: ## System requirements to play
translatedContent: ## System requirements to play

originContent: **Officially supported operating systems:** Windows 10 or newer, Linux (x86-64 and ARM).
translatedContent: **Officially supported operating systems:** Windows 10 or newer, Linux (x86-64 and ARM).

originContent: > macOS is not officially supported (i.e. we don't accept bug reports from macOS) but you can attempt to run it per [issue #29](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/issues/29).
translatedContent: > macOS is not officially supported (i.e. we don't accept bug reports from macOS) but you can attempt to run it per [issue #29](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/issues/29).

originContent: **System Specifications:** [Similar requirements as *Minecraft: Java Edition*](https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4409225939853-Minecraft-Java-Edition-Installation-Issues-FAQ#h_01FFJMSQWJH31CH16H63GX4YKE)
translatedContent: **System Specifications:** [Similar requirements as *Minecraft: Java Edition*](https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4409225939853-Minecraft-Java-Edition-Installation-Issues-FAQ#h_01FFJMSQWJH31CH16H63GX4YKE)

originContent: are used, since the same underlying graphics library (GLFW with OpenGL 4.4) is used.
translatedContent: are used, since the same underlying graphics library (GLFW with OpenGL 4.4) is used.

originContent: ### Minimum requirements
translatedContent: ### Minimum requirements

originContent: * CPU: Intel Core i3-3210 3.2 GHz / AMD A8-7600 APU 3.1 GHz or equivalent
translatedContent: * CPU: Intel Core i3-3210 3.2 GHz / AMD A8-7600 APU 3.1 GHz or equivalent

originContent: * RAM: 4GB
translatedContent: * RAM: 4GB

originContent: * GPU (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line) with OpenGL 4.4
translatedContent: * GPU (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line) with OpenGL 4.4

originContent: * GPU (Discrete): NVIDIA GeForce 400 Series or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series with OpenGL 4.4
translatedContent: * GPU (Discrete): NVIDIA GeForce 400 Series or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series with OpenGL 4.4

originContent: * HDD: At least 1GB for game and levels
translatedContent: * HDD: At least 1GB for game and levels

originContent: * OS: Windows 10 and up, Linux 64-bit distributions from 2018 onwards
translatedContent: * OS: Windows 10 and up, Linux 64-bit distributions from 2018 onwards

originContent: * Display: 1280x720 resolution
translatedContent: * Display: 1280x720 resolution

originContent: ### Recommended requirements
translatedContent: ### Recommended requirements

originContent: * CPU: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz / AMD A10-7800 APU 3.5 GHz or equivalent
translatedContent: * CPU: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz / AMD A10-7800 APU 3.5 GHz or equivalent

originContent: * RAM: 8GB
translatedContent: * RAM: 8GB

originContent: * GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 700 Series or AMD Radeon Rx 200 Series (excluding integrated chipsets) with OpenGL 4.5
translatedContent: * GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 700 Series or AMD Radeon Rx 200 Series (excluding integrated chipsets) with OpenGL 4.5

originContent: * HDD: 2GB (SSD is recommended)
translatedContent: * HDD: 2GB (SSD is recommended)

originContent: * OS: Windows 10 and newer (64-bit), Linux 64-bit distributions from 2020 onwards (e.g. Ubuntu 20.04)
translatedContent: * OS: Windows 10 and newer (64-bit), Linux 64-bit distributions from 2020 onwards (e.g. Ubuntu 20.04)

originContent: * Display: 1920x1080 resolution
translatedContent: * Display: 1920x1080 resolution

originContent: ## Installation instructions
translatedContent: ## Installation instructions

originContent: These instructions are the same if you're downloading the game for the first time or upgrading to a new version.
translatedContent: These instructions are the same if you're downloading the game for the first time or upgrading to a new version.

originContent: Make sure that you meet the system requirements above.
translatedContent: Make sure that you meet the system requirements above.

originContent: __Windows (64-bit only, no Java installation required):__
translatedContent: __Windows (64-bit only, no Java installation required):__

originContent: 1. Navigate to the [latest release here](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/releases/latest) in a new tab or window.
translatedContent: 1. Navigate to the [latest release here](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/releases/latest) in a new tab or window.

originContent: 2. Download the correct version of the game in the Assets section named `PolyrhythmMania_VERSION_win64.zip`, where VERSION is the release version name. **Note the "win64" in the file name.** Don't download the "Source code".
translatedContent: 2. Download the correct version of the game in the Assets section named `PolyrhythmMania_VERSION_win64.zip`, where VERSION is the release version name. **Note the "win64" in the file name.** Don't download the "Source code".

originContent: 3. Find the downloaded zip file in File Explorer. Extract the zip file: right click the downloaded zip file, click "Extract All...", and extract the contents to a folder.
translatedContent: 3. Find the downloaded zip file in File Explorer. Extract the zip file: right click the downloaded zip file, click "Extract All...", and extract the contents to a folder.

originContent: 4. Open the newly extracted folder and go into the `PolyrhythmMania_win64` folder.
translatedContent: 4. Open the newly extracted folder and go into the `PolyrhythmMania_win64` folder.

originContent: 5. Double-click the `LaunchPolyrhythmMania.exe` executable to start the game! (You don't need the Java Runtime Environment already installed, the game comes with a copy.)
translatedContent: 5. Double-click the `LaunchPolyrhythmMania.exe` executable to start the game! (You don't need the Java Runtime Environment already installed, the game comes with a copy.)

originContent: 6. If Windows Defender says "Windows Defender SmartScreen prevented an unrecognized app from starting", you can safely ignore it by clicking "More info" and then "Run anyway".
translatedContent: 6. If Windows Defender says "Windows Defender SmartScreen prevented an unrecognized app from starting", you can safely ignore it by clicking "More info" and then "Run anyway".

originContent: __Other platforms (or for advanced users who already have Java installed)__
translatedContent: __Other platforms (or for advanced users who already have Java installed)__

originContent: 1. **(Pre-requisite)** Ensure you already have the Java Runtime Environment (JRE 17 recommended, JRE 11 minimum) installed and it is accessible in your path as the `java` command.
translatedContent: 1. **(Pre-requisite)** Ensure you already have the Java Runtime Environment (JRE 17 recommended, JRE 11 minimum) installed and it is accessible in your path as the `java` command.

originContent: 2. Navigate to the [latest release here](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/releases/latest) in a new tab or window.
translatedContent: 2. Navigate to the [latest release here](https://github.com/chrislo27/PolyrhythmMania/releases/latest) in a new tab or window.

originContent: 3. Download the correct version of the game in the Assets section named `PolyrhythmMania_VERSION.zip`, where VERSION is the release version name. Don't download the "Source code".
translatedContent: 3. Download the correct version of the game in the Assets section named `PolyrhythmMania_VERSION.zip`, where VERSION is the release version name. Don't download the "Source code".

originContent: 4. Extract the zip file to a known location.
translatedContent: 4. Extract the zip file to a known location.

originContent: 5. Open the newly extracted directory and go into the `PolyrhythmMania_platform_agnostic` directory.
translatedContent: 5. Open the newly extracted directory and go into the `PolyrhythmMania_platform_agnostic` directory.

originContent: 6. Run the appropriate launch script: On Windows, double click `play_windows.bat`. On Linux, run the `play_linux.sh` file (you may have to `chmod +x play_linux.sh` first).
translatedContent: 6. Run the appropriate launch script: On Windows, double click `play_windows.bat`. On Linux, run the `play_linux.sh` file (you may have to `chmod +x play_linux.sh` first).

originContent: 7. If you prefer not to use a launch script, you can run `java -jar bin/PolyrhythmMania.jar` with your preferred settings.
translatedContent: 7. If you prefer not to use a launch script, you can run `java -jar bin/PolyrhythmMania.jar` with your preferred settings.

originContent: ## Compilation instructions
translatedContent: ## Compilation instructions

originContent: These instructions are for people interested in editing the source code of the game.
translatedContent: These instructions are for people interested in editing the source code of the game.

originContent: 1. Ensure JDK 17 or newer is installed.
translatedContent: 1. Ensure JDK 17 or newer is installed.

originContent: 2. `chmod +x gradlew`
translatedContent: 2. `chmod +x gradlew`

originContent: 3. `./gradlew :desktop:run`
translatedContent: 3. `./gradlew :desktop:run`
